content: Hmm, kind of a bummer that the "builds" and "runs" terminology used on the command line no longer matches the terminology used internally ("profiles" and "scenarios")
Hmm, collector::api::next_commit::Commit has a field named runs, so we can't fully get rid of that terminology, :frown:
That should be fairly easily upgradable, right?
just between collector and perf.rlo -- and really can be done in one commit, we'll rebuild the collector binary before we hit the endpoint again
